options.content:
# Retina Network Observability

Visualize metrics for any Kubernetes cluster using [Retina](https://retina.sh/) (any cloud provider, any CNI, any OS). Cycle between all dashboards in the dropdown above.

targets.expr:
sum by (cluster) (
    rate(networkobservability_forward_bytes[$__rate_interval])
    or
    rate(kappie_forward_bytes[$__rate_interval])
    or
    rate(cilium_forward_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])
)

sum by(cluster) (
    rate(networkobservability_forward_count{instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])
    or
    on(cluster)
        rate(kappie_forward_count{instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])
    or
    on(cluster)
        rate(cilium_forward_count_total{instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])
)

sum by (cluster) (
    rate(networkobservability_drop_bytes[$__rate_interval])
    or
    rate(kappie_drop_bytes[$__rate_interval])
    or
    rate(cilium_drop_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])
)

sum by(cluster) (rate(networkobservability_drop_bytes[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(cluster) (rate(kappie_drop_bytes[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(cluster) (rate(cilium_drop_bytes_total[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(cluster) (rate(networkobservability_drop_count[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(cluster) (rate(kappie_drop_count[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by(cluster) (rate(cilium_drop_count_total[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_forward_bytes{direction="egress", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_forward_bytes{direction="egress", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description:
Values:
- Non-Cilium (Linux):
  - iptable_rule_drop: packet dropped in iptables, e.g., because of a NetworkPolicy if using --network-policy=azure
  - iptable_nat_drop: packet dropped in iptables during NAT (Network Address Translation)
  - tcp_connect_basic: packet dropped by tcp connect
  - tcp_accept_basic: packet dropped by tcp accept
  - tcp_close_basic: packet dropped by tcp close
  - conntrack_add_drop: packet dropped while conntrack (connection tracking) was adding the connection
- Cilium (Linux):
  - Many possible values

targets.expr:
sum by (reason) (rate(networkobservability_drop_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (reason) (rate(kappie_drop_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (reason) (rate(cilium_drop_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Bytes Dropped by Reason

panels.description:
Values:
- Non-Cilium (Linux):
  - iptable_rule_drop: packet dropped in iptables, e.g., because of a NetworkPolicy if using --network-policy=azure
  - iptable_nat_drop: packet dropped in iptables during NAT (Network Address Translation)
  - tcp_connect_basic: packet dropped by tcp connect
  - tcp_accept_basic: packet dropped by tcp accept
  - tcp_close_basic: packet dropped by tcp close
  - conntrack_add_drop: packet dropped while conntrack (connection tracking) was adding the connection
  - rx_dropped: an interface dropped a received packet
  - tx_dropped: an interface dropped a transmitted packet
- Non-Cilium (Windows):
  - aclrule: dropped by an ACL rule in VFP, e.g., because of a NetworkPolicy
  - endpoint: dropped by an HNS Pod Endpoint 
- Cilium (Linux):
  - Many possible values

targets.expr:
sum by (reason) (rate(networkobservability_drop_count{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (reason) (rate(kappie_drop_count{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (reason) (rate(cilium_drop_count_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (reason) (
  label_replace(
    rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_dropped", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]),
    "reason",
    "$1",
    "statistic_name",
    "(.*)"
  )
)
or # cannot combine these interface_stats expressions into one using regex, since regex would capture anything with rx_dropped or tx_dropped in it
sum by (reason) (
  label_replace(
    rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_dropped", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]),
    "reason",
    "$1",
    "statistic_name",
    "(.*)"
  )
)

panels.title: Packets Dropped by Reason

targets.expr:
sum by(instance) (rate(networkobservability_drop_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by(instance) (rate(kappie_drop_bytes{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by(instance) (rate(cilium_drop_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(instance) (rate(networkobservability_drop_count{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by(instance) (rate(kappie_drop_count{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by(instance) (rate(cilium_drop_count_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(state) (networkobservability_tcp_state{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"})
or
sum by(state) (kappie_tcp_state{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"})

sum by(address) (networkobservability_tcp_connection_remote{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", address!~"127.0.0.1|0.0.0.0"})
or
sum by(address) (kappie_tcp_connection_remote{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", address!~"127.0.0.1|0.0.0.0"})

panels.title: TCP Active Connections by Remote Addr

targets.expr:
sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="tcptimeouts", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="tcptimeouts", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="resetcount", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="resetcount", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="tcptsreorder", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_connection_stats{statistic_name="tcptsreorder", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_flag_counters{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_flag_counters{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_flag_counters{flag="rst", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_flag_counters{flag="rst", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(networkobservability_tcp_flag_counters{flag="synack", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum(rate(kappie_tcp_flag_counters{flag="synack", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(networkobservability_udp_connection_stats{statistic_name="active", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"})
or
sum(kappie_udp_connection_stats{statistic_name="active", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"})

sum by (interface_name) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_packets", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by (interface_name) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_packets", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (interface_name) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_packets", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))
or
sum by (interface_name) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_packets", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name=~"rx[0-9]+_cache_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (instance) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name=~"rx[0-9]+_cache_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name=~"tx[0-9]+_nop", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (instance) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name=~"tx[0-9]+_nop", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_dropped", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_dropped", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_comp_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (instance) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name="rx_comp_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by (instance) (rate(networkobservability_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_send_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
or
sum by (instance) (rate(kappie_interface_stats{statistic_name="tx_send_full", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
